product_name: Mountain Hardwear Compressor Insulated Pants - Men's
long_description: Enjoy lightweight, compressible warmth on your backcountry adventures in the synthetic-insulated Mountain Hardwear Compressor pants for men. Insulated with warm Thermal.Q(TM) Elite polyester fiber-fill. Pants have an adjustable elastic waist. Mountain Hardwear Compressor pants feature reinforced seat and knees to protect against abrasion. Full side-zip legs offer ventilation options and quick on/off.
short_description: Enjoy lightweight, compressible warmth on your backcountry adventures in the synthetic-insulated Mountain Hardwear Compressor pants for men.
